title: Which magazine is useful for the preparation of science and technology of the UPSC Mains? - Quora
tags: Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: For the preparation of Science and Technology in UPSC Mains, you need to practice the answer writing skills. To know how an answer is written and how to substantiate your ideas, you can take reference from Toppers’ notes or listen to Toppers’ Talks that is rich with brilliant insights. However, if you are looking for an all-round magazine that not only helps with Science and Technology but also gives you all overall guidance about all the topics and Current Affairs of UPSC, I suggest you download the e-magazine called UPSC IQ. It is free of cost, covers almost all the topics and may help in the GS papers as well.
Chronicle,vision IAS any magazine choose you,the hindu newspaper(only s&t),science report is useful in preliminary & mains both
